item.title: QMK Firmware in M1
item.description: Running ./util/qmk_install.sh won’t work. You need rosetta-enabled terminal session then run these command below: $ arch -x86_64 /bin/bash -c "$(curl -fsSL https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Homebrew/install/HEAD/install.sh)" $ arch -x86_64 /usr/local/bin/brew install qmk/qmk/qmk After that, qmk is accessible from anywhere, even from non-rosetta terminal session. This is UNK after being flashed directly from a M1 computer: Happy hacking!
